data.title: Dynamic Bossbar
data.summary: Are you bored with vanilla bossbar that just solid magenta color? Well, You've come to the right place, this pack change the old bossbar into something cooler and it's have different texture depend what boss do you fight

data.title: Bedrock UI+
data.summary: A brand new ui Overhauled from hud+, this ui improves a lots of ui screens, also have so many features that Will helps you in gameplay, such as survival, PVP, etc.

revisions.changelog: • Updated the ender dragon bossbar to the new texture (by Dal4y)

data.title: HUD+ Reworked
data.summary: Are you bored with the regular HUD display and you want something new on your HUD that can make it easier for you to do something? Well, You will probably love this pack!

data.title: No Lava & Water Fog
data.summary: Are you got distracted of water or lava fogs? This pack removed them completely! Removed water fog and enhance your exploring experience. Also with clearer water surface. And remove lava fog, it's useful for finding ancient debris under the lava pool
